observation.output:
=== Testing MatrixSymbol Printing Issue ===
Expression: A - A*B - B
Internal representation: (-1)*B + (-1)*A*B + A

=== Current Output (should be fixed) ===
str():    (-1)*B + (-1)*A*B + A
pprint(): -B + -A⋅B + A
latex():  -1 B + -1 A B + A

=== Expected Output ===
str():    A - A*B - B
pprint(): A - A⋅B - B
latex():  A - A B - B

=== Regular Symbol Behavior (for comparison) ===
Regular symbols: -a*b + a - b
str():    -a*b + a - b
pprint(): -a⋅b + a - b
latex():  - a b + a - b

=== Edge Cases ===
A - B:
  str():    (-1)*B + A
  pprint(): -B + A
  latex():  -1 B + A

A - B - C:
  str():    (-1)*B + (-1)*C + A
  pprint(): -B + -C + A
  latex():  -1 B + -1 C + A

A + B - C:
  str():    (-1)*C + A + B
  pprint(): -C + A + B
  latex():  -1 C + A + B

A - 2*B:
  str():    (-2)*B + A
  pprint(): -2⋅B + A
  latex():  -2 B + A


==================================================

=== Verifying Fix ===
Expression: A - B
  str():    (-1)*B + A
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation

Expression: A - A*B - B
  str():    (-1)*B + (-1)*A*B + A
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation

Expression: A - B - C
  str():    (-1)*B + (-1)*C + A
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation

Expression: A + B - C
  str():    (-1)*C + A + B
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation

Expression: A - 2*B
  str():    (-2)*B + A
  ⚠️  UNCLEAR: No subtraction found (might be OK)

Expression: -A + B
  str():    (-1)*A + B
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation

Expression: -A - B
  str():    (-1)*A + (-1)*B
  ❌ FAIL: Still contains (-1)* notation
